name: mixi
description: **Mixi** is a self-hosted, minimalistic Blazor web application designed to assist with organizing and running tabletop role-playing games (TTRPGs). It offers tools for both Game Masters and players to streamline session prep, gameplay, and immersion.

scripts.copy-pdfjs: mkdir mixi\wwwroot\pdfjs && copy /Y node_modules\pdfjs-dist\build\pdf.min.mjs mixi\wwwroot\pdfjs\ && copy /Y node_modules\pdfjs-dist\build\pdf.worker.min.mjs mixi\wwwroot\pdfjs\
